attributes.action: Which ever Government are in power they fail to listen to the public they serve
attributes.additional_details: The Government in power needs to listen to and respond to those that elect them at all times, not just when their votes are in jeopardy. Be honest, open and responsible. The country expects more, stop the endless blame game, work together and get on with making this country Great again. We are sick of these school boy antics, get serious.
